mapper.select: SELECT i.hotel_no, i.hotel_nm, i.hotel_nm_kr, i.nat, i.state, i.state_kr, i.country, MIN(r.price1) as price1, r.breakfast_yn, d.grade, d.resortfee_yn FROM fit_hotel_info i INNER JOIN fit_hotel_rcmd rc ON i.hotel_no = rc.hotel_no AND rc.use_yn = 'Y' INNER JOIN fit_room_type r ON i.hotel_no = r.hotel_no INNER JOIN fit_hotel_detail d ON i.hotel_no = d.hotel_no GROUP BY i.hotel_no

SELECT i.hotel_no, hotel_nm, hotel_nm_kr, nat, state, state_kr, country, MIN(r.price1) as price1, r.breakfast_yn, d.grade, d.resortfee_yn FROM fit_hotel_info i, fit_room_type r, fit_hotel_detail d WHERE i.hotel_no = r.hotel_no AND i.hotel_no = d.hotel_no AND ( hotel_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR hotel_nm_kr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR state LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') OR state_kr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') ) GROUP BY i.hotel_no

SELECT i.hotel_no, hotel_nm, hotel_nm_kr, nat, state, state_kr, country, hotel_adr, hotel_tel, hotel_url, c.cate_no, c.hotel_no, cate_nm, duration1, duration2, duration3, duration4, remark, cancel_policy, type_no, r.hotel_no, r.cate_no, type_nm, agency_cd, price1, price2, price3, price4, breakfast_yn, breakfast_price, cot_price, cradle_yn, ac_yn, fridge_yn, bath_yn, garden_yn, vault_yn, checkin_time, checkout_time, FLOOR, room_cnt, grade, resortfee_yn, wifi_yn, baby_bed_yn, shuttle_yn, free_parking_yn, valet_parking_yn, pet_yn, pool_yn, spa_yn, recreations, picnic_area_yn, conference_room_yn, kids_club_yn, nursery_yn, washer_yn, multi_lang_staff_yn, tourist_attraction FROM fit_hotel_info i, fit_hotel_cate c, fit_room_type r, fit_hotel_detail d WHERE i.hotel_no = c.hotel_no AND c.hotel_no = r.hotel_no AND c.cate_no = r.cate_no AND i.hotel_no = d.hotel_no AND i.hotel_no = #{hotelNo}

SELECT i.hotel_no, hotel_nm, hotel_nm_kr, nat, state, state_kr, country, hotel_adr, hotel_tel, hotel_url, c.cate_no, c.hotel_no, cate_nm, duration1, duration2, duration3, duration4, remark, cancel_policy, type_no, r.hotel_no, r.cate_no, type_nm, agency_cd, price1, price2, price3, price4, breakfast_yn, breakfast_price, cot_price, cradle_yn, ac_yn, fridge_yn, bath_yn, garden_yn, vault_yn, checkin_time, checkout_time, FLOOR, room_cnt, grade, resortfee_yn, wifi_yn, baby_bed_yn, shuttle_yn, free_parking_yn, valet_parking_yn, pet_yn, pool_yn, spa_yn, recreations, picnic_area_yn, conference_room_yn, kids_club_yn, nursery_yn, washer_yn, multi_lang_staff_yn, tourist_attraction FROM fit_hotel_info i, fit_hotel_cate c, fit_room_type r, fit_hotel_detail d WHERE i.hotel_no = c.hotel_no AND c.hotel_no = r.hotel_no AND c.cate_no = r.cate_no AND i.hotel_no = d.hotel_no AND r.type_no = #{typeNo}

SELECT i.hotel_no, hotel_nm, hotel_nm_kr, nat, state, state_kr, country, hotel_adr, hotel_tel, hotel_url, checkin_time, checkout_time, floor, room_cnt, grade, resortfee_yn, wifi_yn, baby_bed_yn, shuttle_yn, free_parking_yn, valet_parking_yn, pet_yn, pool_yn, spa_yn, recreations, picnic_area_yn, conference_room_yn, kids_club_yn, nursery_yn, washer_yn, multi_lang_staff_yn, tourist_attraction FROM fit_hotel_info i, fit_hotel_detail d WHERE i.hotel_no = d.hotel_no AND i.hotel_no = #{hotelNo}
SELECT hotel_no, hotel_nm, hotel_nm_kr, nat, state, state_kr, country, hotel_adr, hotel_tel, hotel_url FROM fit_hotel_info WHERE hotel_nm like '%#{hotelNm}%'
